Question
========
Test whether the mean grade on exam 6 (variable vak6) for students living away from home [Woon = 0] is significantly different from the mean for students living at home [Woon = 1]. Write the p-value found in the answer box (with 3 decimal places).

* Download**: [SPSS file](eur-inferential_statistics-260-nl-data.sav), [CSV file](eur-inferential_statistics-261-nl-data.csv)


Solution
========
The correct answer is 0.462.
